meaning_str.bing:
n. 骨骼；骨(头)；骨状物；骨制品
v. 抢去；剔掉…的骨；用鲸骨撑大(妇女上衣等)；施骨肥于
网络. 识骨寻踪；骨头社；寻骨线索

骨骼；骨(头)；骨状物；骨制品
抢去；剔掉…的骨；用鲸骨撑大(妇女上衣等)；施骨肥于
识骨寻踪；骨头社；寻骨线索

骨；骨骼；有…样的骨头的；骨头；（bone的复数）
剔骨；挑鱼刺；专心致志；苦学；（bone的第三人称单数）

1.en: Still he could not help noticing what was in the air, and feeling some of its influence in his bones.
1.cn: 尽管如此，他也不能不注意到空中出现的情况，骨子里难免受到感染。

2.en: There was also very little wear and tear on the bones which suggested that they had not been involved with any physical labor.
2.cn: 骨骼上也没有磨损和破裂痕迹，这说明他们并没有从事过体力劳动。

3.en: He would go mad as well if he had to spend his days in this grey soup whilst his flesh and bones turned to stone.
3.cn: 若这些天来他都得呆在这灰色的浓汤里看着自己的骨肉变成石头，他也会疯掉的。

0.en: You can feel all the bones in your skull.

1.en: These are the bones of a real dinosaur. Dine-Saw.
1.cn: 这些都是真恐龙的骨头知道吗。恐龙。

2.en: Put that down! The only souvenirs we collect here are bloody knuckles and broken bones.
2.cn: 放下来，唯一能带走的纪念品是伤的筋和断的骨。

4.en: Yes, that's it. Just step over the pile of bones. A pile of bones. OK, will do. Ah, sure hope Max is safe.
4.cn: 对，就是这样，跨过这堆骨头。一堆骨头，好。希望麦克斯没事。

5.en: Cinderella! Wake up, lazy bones! Tea and a plate of biscuits.
5.cn: 灰姑娘！起床，懒骨头！上茶和一盘饼干。

6.en: But religion, tradition, for most of my people, it's in their bones.
6.cn: 但宗教、传统，对大部分国民，那深入骨髓。

7.en: Your dreams forgotten, your horrors effaced. Your bones will turn to sand.
7.cn: 你的梦想都被遗忘，恐惧都被磨灭，你的尸骨将成为尘土。

8.en: You better clear off before my bones come back, Dobby, or I might strangle you.
8.cn: 你最好在我骨头长出前说清楚，否则我一定会掐死你。

9.en: We've learned more from genetics in the past decade than a century of digging up bones.
9.cn: 相比挖骨头的那个世纪， 过去十年我们从遗传学中学到了更多。

10.en: While all your soft parts decay away, your bones get saturated with mineral-rich waters.
10.cn: 伴随着你身上柔软的部分都慢慢腐烂，你的骨骼充满富含矿物质的海水。

11.en: Otherwise, you'd better hope the sediments around you harden while your bones decay away and another sediment or mineral fills in the spaces your bones leave behind, creating a perfect cast of your skeleton.
11.cn: 不然，你最好盼着在你骨骼渐逝时，你周边的沉积物硬化有别的沉积物或矿物填充你骨骼留下的空间，铸造成完美的骨骼造型。

12.en: He destroyed it. Everything about it. Well, except for the box of bones that you already took.
12.cn: 他把关于他的一切。都毁了。当然 除了你弄走的那箱骨头他没带走

13.en: It doesn't matter if your arms are strong enough to catch her body without breaking your bones.
13.cn: 这和你双臂是否强壮到能接住她的身体而不骨折没有关系。

14.en: I'm afraid it's not. You're young. Your bones will readjust. We'll watch your hormonal balance.
14.cn: 恐怕不是，你还年轻，你的骨骼会调整适应，我们会监控你的激素平衡。

15.en: And they have bones reinforced with naturally occurring carbon fiber. They are very hard to kill.
15.cn: 他们的骨骼含有天生碳纤维，强壮坚硬极难杀死。

16.en: Relax. Look around. No pagan altars, no piles of bones in the corners, they're fine. Go like this.
16.cn: 别紧张，看看四周，没有异教徒的神坛，角落没有成堆的骨头，她们没事的，这个。

17.en: Joints ache, bones and muscles are weaker, the heart doesn't beat with the same power it once did.
17.cn: 关节疼，骨头变脆，肌肉退化，心脏的跳动也不如从前强健了。

18.en: Until your mind is weary, and your bones ache. Until you're too tired to sweat, too wasted to breathe.
18.cn: 直到精疲力竭，筋骨作痛，直到你流干汗水用尽气息。

19.en: You worked yourself to the bone until your bones disintegrated and were replaced by minerals and sediments.
19.cn: 你努力到只剩骨头，直到你的骨骼分解被矿物和沉积岩取代。
